wikipedia_page.main: John Thomas Lewis (1947 – 18 February 2019) was an Anglican priest who was Dean of Llandaff from 2000 to 2012.

response: John Lewis (1940–2020) was the president of the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and a member of US House of Representatives from Georgia.
